statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 4 \\ -1 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 4 \\ -4 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ -19 \\ 17 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 4 \\ -1 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 4 \\ -4 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ -19 \\ 17 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] do not span \mathbb{R}^4.
